metadata.name: Suspicious Vsls-Agent Command With AgentExtensionPath Load
metadata.comment: Detects Microsoft Visual Studio vsls-agent.exe lolbin execution with a suspicious library load using the --agentExtensionPath parameter

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\vsls-agent.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--agentextensionpath')) AND NOT contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('microsoft.visualstudio.liveshare.agent.')))

output.summary: Detects Microsoft Visual Studio vsls-agent.exe lolbin execution with a suspicious library load using the --agentExtensionPath parameter

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: False positives depend on custom use of vsls-agent.exe Reference: https://twitter.com/bohops/status/1583916360404729857
